titles.title: A resolution authorizing filming in the Chamber of the Senate for the use by the Capitol Visitor Center.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 10/21/2005--Passed Senate without amendment. Suspends provisions of rule IV of the Rules for the Regulation of the Senate Wing of the Capitol and Senate Office Buildings (prohibiting the taking of pictures in the Senate Chamber) to permit the taking of pictures while the Senate is in session or in recess for the period beginning on the date of adoption of this resolution and ending October 31, 2005, at locations and times to be determined by the Committee on Rules and Administration. Allows the use of such pictures only by the Capitol Visitor Center for a video presentation in the Center after the video's approval by the Committee.
